channel.title: Safe zones
channel.description:
How exactly do I make something IE: Varrock a safe zone?
[code](absX >= ???? && absX <= ???? && absY >= ???? && absY <= ????)[/code]
I thought all I had to do was like run in a square around the whole thing of varrock and get the coords and put them in the corrective spot... can anyone copy and paste the right code or working code...?
Edit: DON'T TELL ME TO LOOK FOR A TUT. I did find one and I did try to edit the coords for Varrock and apparently is wrong.

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Just go from the southeastern cornor of a place and write down the cords in the first 2 places. Then go to the northwestern place and write down the cords in the last two places.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Just go to each corner your going to have the safe zone within, and use ::mypos

Read full topic
